original_text: The Lord always does what is right. So he has made his law great and important. He is happy when people respect his law. The Lord always does what is right. So he has made his law great and important. He is happy when people respect his law. The Lord always does what is right. So he has made his law great and important. He is happy when people respect his law. The Lord always does what is right. So he has made his law great and important. He is happy when people respect his law. The Lord always does what is right. So he has made his law great and important. He is happy when people respect his law.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 의로 말미암아 기쁨으로 교훈을 크게 하며 존귀하게 하려 하셨으나

sentences.original_text: The Lord always does what is right.
So he has made his law great and important.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그분은 자신의 법을 위대하고 중요하게 만드셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He is happy when people respect his law.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그분의 법을 존중할 때 그분은 기뻐하십니다.
